metadata.title: CVE-2019-11930 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An invalid free in mb_detect_order can cause the application to crash orpotentially result in remote code execution. This issue affects HHVMversions prior to 3.30.12, all versions between 4.0.0 and 4.8.5, allversions between 4.9.0 and 4.23.1, as well as 4.24.0, 4.25.0, 4.26.0,4.27.0, 4.28.0, and 4.28.1.

criterions.comment: hhvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
